about_the_game:
Expand your journey into the untamed wilderness with Wild Lynx Jigsaw - Expansion Pack 2! This captivating expansion introduces brand-new levels that let you piece together even more of the beauty and mystery of the majestic lynx.

From 30-piece relaxing puzzles to intricate 285-piece challenges, immerse yourself in stunning new scenes of the lynx roaming its natural habitat.

Experience the elegance of this elusive feline with fresh puzzles that feature vivid images of snow-covered forests, sunlit meadows, and tranquil mountain landscapes. Whether you're a casual puzzler or a seasoned pro, these new levels bring you closer to the enchanting world of the lynx.

Highlights of the Expansion Pack:

  • Discover the Lynx: Explore all-new puzzles showcasing the lynx in breathtaking new wild environments.

  • Journey Through Nature: Unlock additional scenes of dense forests, icy tundras, and serene glades teeming with life.

  • Tailor Your Challenge: Choose your puzzle size, from quick 30-piece creations to intricate 285-piece masterpieces for a rewarding challenge.

  • Collect and Learn: Solve the new puzzles to reveal more interesting facts about the lynx and unlock unique wildlife-themed surprises.

"Wild Lynx Jigsaw - Expansion Pack 2" takes your adventure into the wilderness to greater heights with exciting new levels and stunning artwork. Dive back into the heart of nature and uncover the magic of the wild, one piece at a time!

  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Pentium 4 or higher, 2GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB or higher
